snippet: The 800-meter champion David Rudisha was named the Association of National Olympic Committees’ best male athlete at the most recent Summer Olympics, while the table tennis player Li Xiaoxia took the women’s honor.
lead_paragraph: The 800-meter champion David Rudisha was named the Association of National Olympic Committees’ best male athlete at the most recent Summer Olympics, while the table tennis player Li Xiaoxia took the women’s honor.
